summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the South Spokane Street Viaduct Project; providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of elevated structures and approaches thereto on South Spokane Street; providing for the widening of South Spokane Street; providing for changing and establishing of the necessary grades; authorizing acquisition of certain real property and property rights necessary therefor; authorizing acquisition by condemnation, if necessary; and authorizing provision of relocation benefits to qualified displaced persons.
